#summary Front page.

= Introduction =

Fiblib is an efficient, imperative Fibonacci heap library, based on the pseudocode of Cormen, Leiserson, Rivest, and Stein. It aims to be practical and elegant.

== Dependencies ==
fiblib currently depends on [http://www.xs4all.nl/~mmzeeman/ocaml/ OUnit], but only if you want to build and run the unit tests.
